attributes.action: Re think red arrows at 2012 opening
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If it is true that the "authorities" are considering prohibiting the Red Arrows from displaying at the 2012 London Olympics then it is totally barmy and such decision needs to be reversed and publically before you switch off a further swathe of already only interested but not yet committed games London 2012 supporters

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
